content: There was a request for a stabilization PR for a subset of #67264 which... I said I'd do... and then fell off the face of the Earth :sweat_smile: but I'm back to it and I realized that there was never an RFC posted for this. Does that need to be done before this can be advanced? https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/83918
let me add that to the project board
I'm not sure about the RFC question though!
